Lyric:
[by:种果园的渔夫]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:23.54]When you remember
[00:28.95]It will be random
[00:34.38]Accidentally
[00:39.50]You'll remember
[00:41.54]
[00:42.95]I was the one
[00:44.98]Who made a land in your eyes
[00:47.69]The one you forget
[00:49.95]The one you can't get back
[00:52.86]The one you're stealing the memories from
[00:59.35]The one who is gone
[01:04.63]
[01:23.61]Along the rivers
[01:28.49]Water under bridges
[01:34.28]There will be fractions
[01:38.57]They will show up in pieces
[01:43.90]Occasional fragments
[01:49.94]You'll remember
[01:52.92]
[01:55.43]I was the one
[01:57.65]You saw far from the sea
[02:00.31]The one that you lost
[02:02.97]The one you concealed
[02:04.86]
[02:05.77]I was the one
[02:07.68]For whom you set the course
[02:10.14]The one you left aside
[02:12.70]The one that now can't be yours
[02:14.96]
[02:15.70]The one you're stealing the memories from
[02:22.17]The one who is gone
